title: Go Ahri Go Ahri Go Ahri.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

replies.body: Well, Ezreal, Syndra, Annie, Brand, Veigar, and quite a few others can as well.. Just... For the love of god, if Heimer isn't banned, you gotta not pick immobile melee champs like Garen, Darius, Mundo, or Tahm.
